markdownRemark.html:
Thanks to RStudio and the usethis and ROxygen packages, the building of a R package is much convenient. Here is a typical workflow:

  1. Initialize the project of package
usethis::create_package("...")
  1. Modify the description
  2. Copy and save R code in the /R folder
  3. Build -> Load All
  4. Remove the library(…) in the code, and add the packages by
usethis::use_package("...")
  1. Build -> Check
  2. Write help for each function: Code -> Insert ROxygen Skeleton
  3. Assign the other packages’ functions using in the code
  @importFrom package function1, function2...
  1. Build -> Documents
  2. usethis::use_readme_md()
  3. Build -> build binary

Done!
